t: The unknown budget gaming brand - Bloody - gaming mouse & kb review
s: December 26, 2021 - For the mechanical keyboards, Bloody manufactures own key switches, which can be hit or miss as they don’t have enough reviews yet. The brand itself looks pretty underestimated/recognized in the EU/US (just see the amount of Amazon reviews compared to popular trademarks).
